Iran says US-Britain attack on Houthis will fuel instability in regionIran said on Friday it condemns the U.S.-Britain attack on Houthis in Yemen warning that it will fuel "insecurity and instability" in the region, Iranian state media reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:55:43 GMT R3WQY5MAUZIIHKK4IXGUDFTLDM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-says-us-britain-houthis-attack-will-fuel-region-instability-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东地区
S.Korea court overturns conviction against contractor on Taiwan submarinesA South Korean appeals court has thrown out the conviction of a local company charged with violating trade laws for its work on Taiwan's new military submarine program, a ruling reviewed by Reuters showed. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:54:06 GMT NB6DD6MEQNO45EY44HDPJEARLY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/korea-court-overturns-conviction-against-contractor-taiwan-submarines-2024-01-12/Ju-Min Park世界亚太地区
Russia requests UN Security Council meeting after U.S. and Britain strike YemenRussia said it had requested an urgent meeting of the United Nations Security Council on Friday to discuss military strikes on Yemen by the United States and Britain. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:29:40 GMT UPQ3X6UTHVL4BIY4PWW6ABHJHE https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-requests-un-security-council-meeting-after-us-britain-strike-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
Taiwan expects China to apply pressure on incoming government after electionTaiwan's government believes China is likely to attempt to put pressure on its incoming president after the island goes to the polls on Saturday, including staging military manoeuvres near the island this spring, two senior government officials said. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:17:46 GMT KIFK2TTNEZMSLLJRBHMNTXQKBU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-expects-china-to-apply-Pressure-incoming-government-after-election-2024-01-12/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
Vietnam's top leader misses meetings amid health concernsThe head of Vietnam's Communist Party Nguyen Phu Trong is expected to miss on Friday the second state visit of a foreign leader to Hanoi in less than a week amid concerns about his health. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 04:57:32 GMT CXKC46KVK5LQTHDNHVSIUCGIKA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-top-leader-misses-meetings-amid-health-concerns-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan's third party, looking for poll breakthrough, says it is happy to work with othersThe presidential candidate for the small Taiwan People's Party (TPP) said on Friday he is willing to set politics aside and work with other parties if he wins Saturday's election, describing himself as the only person Beijing and Washington would have no problem with. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 04:26:50 GMT LKG5J7IY6ZMGBCFOF6WA5NOOBM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwans-third-party-looking-poll-breakthrough-says-it-is-happy-working-with-others-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Anti-war activists in New York City, Washington protest U.S., UK strikes in YemenA few dozen anti-war activists gathered at Times Square in New York City and outside the White House late on Thursday to protest U.S. and British strikes against Houthi military targets in Yemen, saying the step threatened to widen the war in Gaza. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 03:53:07 GMT O6CWCGZOWBOBBOO2BXEA72B5EA https://www.reuters.com/world/anti-war-activists-new-york-city-washington-protest-us-uk-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Kanishka Singh世界
Australia says it provided personnel support for US, UK strikes in YemenAustralia provided personnel support to the U.S. and UK in their strikes against Houthi military targets in Yemen, Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 03:04:10 GMT BE4Y4N3VNVP77KBMXOLVWHVFVE https://www.reuters.com/world/australia-says-it-provided-personnel-support-us-uk-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
Blinken to meet senior Chinese official ahead of Taiwan electionsU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:30:08 GMT UGZZ2HWD4RNXXHPQRCTCR5QGUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinking-meet-senior-chinese-official-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Saudi Arabia calls for restraint after air strikes on YemenSaudi Arabia called for restraint and "avoiding escalation" in light of the air strikes launched by the United States and Britain against sites linked to the Houthi movement in Yemen, the kingdom's foreign ministry said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:27:11 GMT OKZRQTVRXJUNBP4TMSK4WB6M4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-arabia-calls-for-restraint-after-air-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东地区
North Korea poised to admit first known tourists since 2020A group from Russia is poised to be the first known tourists allowed into North Korea since anti-pandemic border lockdowns began in early 2020, according to a post from Russian provincial authorities and a Western tour guide. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:09:45 GMT 2DPN7BKIJZLYFGHS5PASE2IH5M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-poished-admit-first-known-tourists-since-2020-2024-01-12/Josh Smith世界亚太地区
